name: Clear The Circle
description:
Clear all the black pieces around you with just tapping on any side of the screen.
don't forget to tap otherwise you will fall down and lose life and more important you will have to
start with the previous level.

How to play:

- Tap on screen and hit the blacks and clear the circle to pass the next level.
- make 100 score and have COMBO to pass easy to the next level.
- Press "5" in Menu watch the advertisement to add 5 point to score.
